oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Velvo cough syrup - Webb Pierce advertisement - 1957-08
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio advertisements for Velvo cough syrup voiced by Webb Pierce and Dave Overton in August of 1957.
